name: Stranded Starship
description:
Your starship has run out of fuel, leaving you stranded on an unknown alien planet. You've got to get some more, but how?

The web version is extremely laggy - playing the download version is highly recommended

All recipes start from the top left corner - check screenshots for an example (and if you can't figure out the recipes, you can find a recipe list in the downloads)

  • Movement - WASD/Arrow keys
  • Use item - Left click
  • Interact/Pick up - E
  • Restart game - Spacebar
  • Put items in the slot below the craft button to equip them

A game I made for Jamcraft 5. Hope you like it!

also, I accidentally left in the bow + some numbers show up in the inventory, ignore them or enjoy your cheated bow >:] (press e to pick it up)
